messages.content: [{"criteria":"Define the operating netback per BOE formula as Realized price/BOE - (production and operation expenses + taxes other than income taxes)/BOE","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Find FY 2024 Realized crude oil price as $76.74/bbl","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Find the realized NGL price as $22.43/bbl"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Find the realized bitumen price as $47.92/bbl"},{"criteria":"Find the realized natural gas price as $2.61/mcf","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Use the 6:1 mcf to BOE conversion ratio","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Find the crude production rate as 969 MBD","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Find the NGL production rate as 304 MBD","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Find the Bitumen production rate as 122 MBD","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Find the gas production rate as 2200 MMCFD","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Calculate the annual total BOE as (969+304+122+2200/6) * 366 = 644.77 million BOE"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Find the annual crude volume as 354,654 (mbbl)"},{"criteria":"Find the annual NGL volume as 111,264 (mbbl)","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Find the annual bitumen volume as 44,652 (mbbl)","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Find the annual gas volume as 805,200 (mmcf units)","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Find the consolidated realized price per BOE (weighted) as $52.66/BOE","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Find the production & operating expenses as 8751"},{"criteria":"Find the taxes other than income taxes as 2087","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Calculate the cost per BOE as (8751+2087)/644.77mm = $16.81/BOE"},{"criteria":"Find the FY 2024 netback per BOE as 52.66 - 16.81 = $35.85/BOE","operator":"correctness"}]
